title: When It Comes To Thinking, 2 Fish Heads Are Better Than 1
teaser: Maybe we can learn from fish â€” they don't call a group of them a school for nothing. Researchers found that when 2 fish swim together, they make better decisions than when 2 fish are swimming alone.
